snippet.title: Tiny Pasture DEMO is OUT NOW! Idle desktop-pet game you can play while working & studying
snippet.description:
Tiny Pasture is an idle farm simulation game that lets you have a variety of charming pixel animals right on your desktop! Players can buy adorable animal babies, care for them, unlock automation facilities, and discover even more critters. 
Positioned at the bottom of your screen, this game beautifies your desktop and scales perfectly to accompany you during work or study.

The Demo is released! Search Tiny Pasture on Steam and download the DEMO version!
